#summary Release Process
#labels Phase-Implementation

= Introduction =

The DTGen release process incorporates a software generator into the

  * Optionally Drop/Create Gen User
  * Load schema (glob, integ, mods, ods, oltp)
  * Run Unit Test Scripts
  * Re-Generate Scripts
  * Re-Create Database
  * Run Unit Tests
  * Run Integration Tests
